section.p:
If there is a tick in the box, immediately.
If not, , and read on.
You learned the password ‘Rebirth’ in the library of Dweomer.
‘My, aren’t we the wise one,’ carps the door sarcastically. ‘Still, a job’s a job, eh?’ it mutters.

The door lifts straight up, and you step into the shadows of the Tomb of the Wizard King. It is lit by still-burning torches that give off an eerie eldritch glow. In the middle of the large round chamber, a sarcophagus lies, surrounded by a pentacle drawn in blood. You notice the blood still seems fresh!
